data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guedes, Thaís B., Barbo, Fausto E., França, Daniella, Zaher, Hussam (2018): Morphological variation of the rare psammophilous species Apostolepis gaboi (Serpentes, Dipsadidae, Elapomorphini). Zootaxa 4418 (5): 469-480, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4418.5.4
